message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be perfect for you and I'm confident you'll get a lot of use out of it.  I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $15,000 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is really the lowest I can go. I know this product is worth every penny and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.  What do you say?
